name: Gloaming Dancer
text: You have mastered the elementary lessons required by your Gloaming Dancer instructors. As a reward, they usher you into the higher mysteries of their tradition. The secrets they impart reveal the Shadowfell’s ubiquity and how to harness the dark magic flowing from the plane of shadow into the mortal realm until you can step between worlds with ease. The shadows rise up at your command, tearing open the gaps you need to dance across the battlefield unchecked and giving you opportunities you can use to land the killing blow.

features.dancingAction(11thLevel): When you spend an action point to take an extra action, you can also teleport 5 squares
features.sinisterShadows(11thLevel): You gain a +2 bonus to Stealth checks
features.shadowBlend(16thLevel): When you subject an enemy to three or more shrouds, you can remove two shrouds to animate the enemy’s shadows until the end of the encounter or until you use assassin’s shroud against a different target

flavorText: I am everywhere and nowhere. I am death’s specter, and I am here to claim your soul.
